"Tele-Tellers": Community-based news delivery services where local volunteers would deliver handwritten news summaries to subscribers' doors.
"NewsNexus": A virtual reality platform that allows users to immerse themselves in news stories.
"The Daily Dossier": A daily news podcast hosted by a rotating cast of journalists and experts.
"Newswire": A social media platform that uses AI to curate and deliver news to users.
"The Newsroom": A virtual reality newsroom where users can participate in the news-making process.
